title: Hanes Men's Originals Stretch Cotton Pack, Moisture-Wicking Tank Tops, Tagless, 3-Pack
description: BASICS THAT ARE FAR FROM BASIC - A stylish collection of cool, modern essentials designed for comfort, made for every body. Be yourself in Hanes Originals.
THREE PACK - Stock up with three shirts, so you’ll never be without a clean Hanes tee.
MOVES WITH YOU - Men’s tanks are crafted from a 95% cotton, 5% spandex blend for a lightweight, stretchy t-shirt that moves when you do.
MOISTURE MANAGEMENT - Stay fresher and drier with tank tops designed to wick for moisture.
COOL AND BREATHABLE - Cotton-rich blended fabric is breathable so you stay cooler from the inside out.
SAY NO TO THE ITCH - Tagless design eliminates the itch from annoying tags.

Just say yes to the stretch. Hanes Originals men’s tanks are crafted from a cotton blend that includes just a touch of spandex. The result? A super-soft men’s tank top that moves when you do. Cool and breathable, this Hanes tank wicks for moisture so you stay drier. A Tagless® design eliminates annoying itching caused by tags. The modern men’s fit feels smooth against your skin. Simple and classic, this men’s tank shirt is poised to do double-duty as both an essential basic and a standout top layer when the weather is warm. Building comfort from the inside out. It’s been the Hanes way for more than 100 years.
